quiz.title: How scoring works (quiz)
quiz.b1: You get 1 attempt per quiz. Leaders do not earn quiz XP.
quiz.b2: Each correct answer gives XP by difficulty: Basic 5, Intermediate 10, Advanced 20, Expert 40.
quiz.b3: Your quiz XP is the sum of correct answers.
quiz.b4: If the monthly Forum bonus is enabled, it can increase your monthly XP (up to 20%).

forum.title: How scoring works (forum)
forum.b1: Engagement is calculated monthly (quantity + quality; AI helps evaluate).
forum.b2: The Top 10 of the month can receive a 5%–20% bonus on monthly XP (quizzes + actions), if enabled in Studio.
forum.b3: Posts with images, real cases and transcribed audio enrich learning.
forum.b4: Leaders can close topics and turn discussions into compendiums, quizzes and challenges.

challenge.title: How scoring works (actions)
challenge.b1: Actions are reviewed by 3 reviewers (direct leader, division leader and manager).
challenge.b2: Final score is the average of the 3 reviews; it applies over challenge XP and team modifiers.
challenge.b3: To avoid duplicates, provide date, location and SAP note (when applicable).
challenge.b4: Attachments (images, audio, reports) help the review and keep a complete history.
